about.title: About
about.message_tools: This project is written with {urlVueJs} and {urlTS} and uses {urlPinia}, {urlVueRouter}, {urlBulma} and {urlI18n}
about.message_dev_tools: This project was created using {urlVite}, {urlVueTest}, {urlCypress} and {urlVueDevTools}. See more info on the github page for this app at {urlSource}

errors.TABLE_404_NEXT: Table Error: Next player not found!
errors.TABLE_404_NEXT_DEALT: Table Error: Next dealer not found!

pitch.title: Pitch
pitch.message_summary: Pitch (a.k.a Bidding Pitch, derived from Whist) is a lovely card game. Give it a try!

errors.BID_400_LESS_THAN_2: Invalid Bid: cannot bid less than 2
errors.BID_400_NOT_EXCEED_BID: Invalid Bid: bid must exceed current bid
errors.BID_400_TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Invalid Bid: too many attempts! I'm bidding for you...
errors.PLAY_400_INVALID_CARD: Invalid Play: must be valid card
errors.PLAY_400_TOO_MANY_ATTEMPTS: Invalid Play: too many attempts! I'm playing for you...

corners.title: Kings in the Corners
corners.message_description: Kings in the Corners is not yet ready to be played...
corners.message_waitdescription: For now, play it by yourself or with buddies - simple and fun!
corners.message_summary: (WIP) Not quite ready to work on this yet... Stay tuned!

spit.title: Spit
spit.message_description: Spit is not yet ready to be played...
spit.message_waitdescription: For now, have sweet dreams of spitting out cards faster than your opponents can salivate...
spit.message_summary: (WIP) Spit is a fast-paced card game similar to Slap Jack but a bit more complex. Stay tuned!
